SALEM

Periyar University: Department of Library and Information Science, international workshop on ‘scholarly research publications, writing, citations and plagiarism’, Wathmanel Seneviratne, Chief Librarian, Open University of Sri Lanka, Nawala, Nugegoda, delivers key-note address, W.K.M.M.K. Weerasinghe, Professor, Department of Library and Information Science, University of Kelaniya, felicitates, C. Swaminathan, Vice Chancellor, presides, 10 a.m.; M. Manivannan, Registrar, delivers valedictory address, Asoka Sriyani Siriwardana, Chief Librarian, Rajarata University, Mihintale, felicitates, 4 p.m.

District Administration: Grievances day meeting, V. Sampath, Collector, presides, collectorate, 10 a.m.

National Leprosy Eradication Programme: National Leprosy Day, V. Sampath, Collector, flags off rally, A. K. Kumuda, Deputy Director of Health Services (leprosy) and others speak, Collectorate, 9.30 a.m.

Salem Consumer Voice: Motivation programme for students, P. S. Panneerselvam, MD, Shanmuga Hospital, chief guest, Sinnupandiarasu and others speak, J. M. Boopathi, presides, Fort Boys Higher Secondary School, 3 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

District administration: Grievances day meeting, V. Dakshinamoorthy, Collector, presides, collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Paavai Institutions: Residential motivation programme, 10 a.m.; Department of MBA: Campus recruitment by Exide Life Insurance Company Limited, 9 a.m.

ERODE

Erode Sengunthar Engineering College: NSS programme, school building renovation and awareness rally on free education, Gundri,

9.00 a.m.
title: Engagements
